00026 enum PhysicsEngineOptions
00027 {
00028     PEO_SelfCollisions = 1,

00034 class OPENRAVE_API PhysicsEngineBase : public InterfaceBase
00035 {
00036 public:
00037     PhysicsEngineBase(EnvironmentBasePtr penv) : InterfaceBase(PT_PhysicsEngine, penv) {
00038     }
00039     virtual ~PhysicsEngineBase() {
00040     }
00041 
00043     static inline InterfaceType GetInterfaceTypeStatic() {
00044         return PT_PhysicsEngine;
00045     }
00046 
00048     virtual bool SetPhysicsOptions(int physicsoptions) = 0;
00049     virtual int GetPhysicsOptions() const = 0;
00050 
00052     virtual bool SetPhysicsOptions(std::ostream& sout, std::istream& sinput) RAVE_DEPRECATED = 0;
00053 
00055     virtual bool InitEnvironment() = 0;
00056 
00059     virtual void DestroyEnvironment() = 0;
00060 
00062     virtual bool InitKinBody(KinBodyPtr body) = 0;
00063 
00069     virtual bool SetLinkVelocity(KinBody::LinkPtr link, const Vector& linearvel, const Vector& angularvel) = 0;
00070 
00075     virtual bool SetLinkVelocities(KinBodyPtr body, const std::vector<std::pair<Vector,Vector> >& velocities) = 0;
00076 
00080     virtual bool GetLinkVelocity(KinBody::LinkConstPtr link, Vector& linearvel, Vector& angularvel) = 0;
00081 
00084     virtual bool GetLinkVelocities(KinBodyConstPtr body, std::vector<std::pair<Vector,Vector> >& velocities) = 0;
00085 
00090     virtual bool SetBodyForce(KinBody::LinkPtr link, const Vector& force, const Vector& position, bool bAdd) OPENRAVE_DUMMY_IMPLEMENTATION;
00091 
00096     virtual bool SetBodyTorque(KinBody::LinkPtr link, const Vector& torque, bool bAdd) OPENRAVE_DUMMY_IMPLEMENTATION;
00097 
00101     virtual bool AddJointTorque(KinBody::JointPtr pjoint, const std::vector<dReal>& pTorques) OPENRAVE_DUMMY_IMPLEMENTATION;
00102

00120     virtual void SimulateStep(dReal fTimeElapsed)=0;

00123     virtual bool GetBodyVelocity(KinBodyConstPtr body, std::vector<Vector>& vLinearVelocities, std::vector<Vector>& vAngularVelocities) RAVE_DEPRECATED {
00124         std::vector<std::pair<Vector,Vector> > velocities;
00125         if( !GetLinkVelocities(body, velocities) ) {
00126             return false;
00127         }
00128         vLinearVelocities.resize(velocities.size());
00129         vAngularVelocities.resize(velocities.size());
00130         for(size_t i = 0; i < velocities.size(); ++i) {
00131             vLinearVelocities[i] = velocities[i].first;
00132             vAngularVelocities[i] = velocities[i].second;
00133         }
00134         return true;
00135     }
00136 
00137     virtual bool SetBodyVelocity(KinBodyPtr body, const std::vector<Vector>& vLinearVelocities, const std::vector<Vector>& vAngularVelocities) RAVE_DEPRECATED {
00138         BOOST_ASSERT(vLinearVelocities.size()==vAngularVelocities.size());
00139         std::vector<std::pair<Vector,Vector> > velocities(vLinearVelocities.size());
00140         for(size_t i = 0; i < velocities.size(); ++i) {
00141             velocities[i].first = vLinearVelocities[i];
00142             velocities[i].second = vAngularVelocities[i];
00143         }
00144         return SetLinkVelocities(body,velocities);
00145     }
00146 
00147 protected:
00148     virtual void SetPhysicsData(KinBodyPtr body, UserDataPtr data) {
00149         body->SetPhysicsData(data);
00150     }
00151 
00152 private:
00153     virtual const char* GetHash() const {
00154         return OPENRAVE_PHYSICSENGINE_HASH;
00155     }
00156 };
